enWisdom: Talebearing is the characteristic of a traitor
Talebearing is an offense [and a sin] that cannot be forgotten

Wisdom: السَّاعِي كَاذِبٌ لِمَنْ سَعَى إِلَيْهِ ظَالِمٌ لِمَنْ سَعَى عَلَيْهِ
enWisdom: The slanderer is a liar to the one whom he spreads his slander and an oppressor to the one whom he slanders about

Wisdom: أَكْذِبِ السِّعَايَةَ وَالنَّمِيمَةَ بَاطِلَةً كَانَتْ أَوْ [أَمْ‏] صَحِيحَةً
enWisdom: Belie slander and talebearing, whether it is false or true
The worst [type of] truthful speech is gossip
